about_the_game:
This game represents the journey of a software engineer exploring game development with Unreal Engine. It’s a prototype for a Multiplayer FPS set in a Wild West environment, designed for group play with up to six players per server. The primary appeal lies in the game's unique feature: the absence of fully automatic weapons.

Choose your character and jump into the action as a cowboy! Armed with just a rifle, revolver, and a knife, you'll need your wits about you to survive—because it’s going to get wild!

Enter the fray in a chaotic battle where every kill counts. Be the first to take down another player, and you’ll earn a bounty on your head. But don’t get too comfortable—the real fun begins when the timer starts ticking, and everyone’s out to track you down!

Survival is key, but don’t take it too seriously! If you manage to stay alive, you’ll reap the rewards. If another player takes you down, they snag your bounty, and the cycle continues until one player remains standing long enough to claim victory.

Gather your friends and see who can become the ultimate bounty hunter in this goofy, competitive Wild West experience!

content_descriptors.notes: The game features mature content such as nudity, alcohol consumption, and graphic violence, including decapitation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8600 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 8GB / 2060 SUPER 8GB / RTX 3060 8GB / RTX 4060 8GB / AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 8GB / RX 6600 8GB / Intel® Arc™ A770 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update) / Windows® 11 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 3070 Ti / AMD Radeon™ RX 6800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Prototype of a small Multiplayer FPS in a Wild West environment that you can play with your friends.
